report.title: Occurrences Download using standard filters for BeeWalk
report.description: Report suitable for downloading data, compatible with the standard report filter parameters.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences o JOIN occurrences occ on occ.id=o.id and occ.deleted=false JOIN samples s on s.id=o.sample_id AND s.deleted=false JOIN samples sp on sp.id=s.parent_id AND sp.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (index_locations_samples ils JOIN locations l on l.id=ils.location_id JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt on ctt.id=l.location_type_id AND ctt.term='Vice County' ) on ils.sample_id=o.sample_id left join location_attribute_values lavest on lavest.location_id=sp.location_id and lavest.location_attribute_id=40 and lavest.deleted=false left join location_attribute_values lavtl on lavtl.location_id=sp.location_id and lavtl.location_attribute_id=39 and lavtl.deleted=false left join location_attribute_values lavsl on lavsl.location_id=s.location_id and lavsl.location_attribute_id=49 and lavsl.deleted=false left join location_attribute_values lavh1 on lavh1.location_id=s.location_id and lavh1.location_attribute_id=44 and lavh1.deleted=false left join cache_termlists_terms th1 on th1.id=lavh1.int_value left join location_attribute_values lavh2 on lavh2.location_id=s.location_id and lavh2.location_attribute_id=45 and lavh2.deleted=false left join cache_termlists_terms th2 on th2.id=lavh2.int_value left join location_attribute_values lavh3 on lavh3.location_id=s.location_id and lavh3.location_attribute_id=46 and lavh3.deleted=false left join cache_termlists_terms th3 on th3.id=lavh3.int_value left join location_attribute_values lavh4 on lavh4.location_id=s.location_id and lavh4.location_attribute_id=47 and lavh4.deleted=false left join cache_termlists_terms th4 on th4.id=lavh4.int_value left join location_attribute_values lavhd on lavhd.location_id=s.location_id and lavhd.location_attribute_id=48 and lavhd.deleted=false left join location_attribute_values lavlu1 on lavlu1.location_id=s.location_id and lavlu1.location_attribute_id=82 and lavlu1.deleted=false left join cache_termlists_terms tlu1 on tlu1.id=lavlu1.int_value left join location_attribute_values lavlu2 on lavlu2.location_id=s.location_id and lavlu2.location_attribute_id=83 and lavlu2.deleted=false left join cache_termlists_terms tlu2 on tlu2.id=lavlu2.int_value left join location_attribute_values lavlud on lavlud.location_id=s.location_id and lavlud.location_attribute_id=84 and lavlud.deleted=false join sample_attribute_values savst on savst.sample_id=sp.id and savst.sample_attribute_id=287 and savst.deleted=false join sample_attribute_values savet on savet.sample_id=sp.id and savet.sample_attribute_id=288 and savet.deleted=false left join sample_attribute_values savs on savs.sample_id=sp.id and savs.sample_attribute_id=375 and savs.deleted=false left join cache_termlists_terms ts on ts.id=savs.int_value left join sample_attribute_values savws on savws.sample_id=sp.id and savws.sample_attribute_id=290 and savws.deleted=false left join cache_termlists_terms tws on tws.id=savws.int_value left join sample_attribute_values savt on savt.sample_id=sp.id and savt.sample_attribute_id=376 and savt.deleted=false left join cache_termlists_terms tt on tt.id=savt.int_value left join occurrence_attribute_values oavq on oavq.occurrence_id=o.id and oavq.occurrence_attribute_id=144 and oavq.deleted=false left join occurrence_attribute_values oavw on oavw.occurrence_id=o.id and oavw.occurrence_attribute_id=145 and oavw.deleted=false left join occurrence_attribute_values oavm on oavm.occurrence_id=o.id and oavm.occurrence_attribute_id=146 and oavm.deleted=false left join occurrence_attribute_values oavu on oavu.occurrence_id=o.id and oavu.occurrence_attribute_id=262 and oavu.deleted=false left join occurrence_attribute_values oavfv on oavfv.occurrence_id=o.id and oavfv.occurrence_attribute_id=149 and oavfv.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist#
